action.name: Execute
action.command: urxvt -geometry 100x30 -title mkbrutus -e sh -c 'cd /opt/mkbrutus/; python3 mkbrutus.py -h; bash -l'

action.name: Execute
action.command: urxvt -geometry 100x30 -title goofile -e sh -c 'cd /opt/goofile; python goofile.py -h; bash -l'

action.name: Execute
action.command: urxvt -geometry 100x30 -title balbuzard -e sh -c 'cd /usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/balbuzard; python balbuzard.py; bash -l'

action.name: Execute
action.command: urxvt -ls +sb -g 60x8+900+600 -title start-nginx -e sh -c 'echo starting nginx server; /usr/sbin/nginx -c /etc/nginx/nginx.conf;sleep 5;exit 1; bash -l'

action.name: Execute
action.command: urxvt -ls +sb -g 60x8+900+600 -title 'nginx' -e sh -c 'echo stoping nginx server; /usr/sbin/nginx -s stop;sleep 5; exit 1; bash -l'
